trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The brusque Loporrit has a mind to do something dangerous, and has clearly heard of your proclivity for recklessness...
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the brusque Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_TODO_01<tab>Investigate the Allagan relic.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_TODO_02<tab>Return to the brusque Loporrit, and defeat any enemies that attack.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the brusque Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the systems cube to the brusque Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_000<tab>I hear you have a penchant for excitement and adventure, is that correct?
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_001<tab>Then I assume in your travels you have doubtless heard tales of the Allagans.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_A1_000_001<tab>The Allagans? Don't get me started.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_A1_000_002<tab>Yes, and nearly everything wrong with the world seems to be their fault.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_002<tab>I thought as much.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_003<tab>I ask because I have plans to survey an Allagan relic not far from here. The weapons guarding it, however, make it too dangerous for me to go alone.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_004<tab>I trust you see where this is going. So, are you interested in a little adventure?
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_005<tab>Much obliged. Now, let's be off. No time to waste.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_010<tab>The crash site is just ahead. If you find anything that may prove useful, I'd be grateful if you could retrieve it for me.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_011<tab>Onward, then. Er... After you.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_013<tab>Large, isn't it? I wonder what secrets it holds...
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>This bit of Allagan technology is certainly fascinating. A shame it's too bulky to carry back...
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>This apparatus is offline, but appears to be transportable. You place it in your ambiguously sized bag...
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_030<tab>Phew. A moment longer and that drone would have alerted more...
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_031<tab>Now, did you find anything of interest?
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_032<tab>Oh? Let me have a look...
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_033<tab>No, you're right. It must wait until we get back.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_040<tab>Safe at last. Now, show me what you found.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_041<tab>This... This is an Allagan decryption unit.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_042<tab>With it, we could read Allagan tomestones about history, science, poetry... If we had any, which we do not. An adventure for another day, I suppose.
TEXT_AKTKZE014_04253_LOPORRIT04253_000_043<tab>Nevertheless, I'm deeply excited by the prospect─as I'm sure you can tell. You have my heartfelt gratitude.
